sense.gloss: to ask, to enquire, to query
to hear about, to hear of, to learn of
to follow (advice, order, etc.), to obey, to listen to, to comply with
to hear (e.g. a plea), to grant (a request), to accept (e.g. an argument), to give consideration to
to smell (esp. incense), to sample (a fragrance)
being able to hear something (clearly), clearness of a sound, reception (e.g. of a radio station)
to be heard, to be audible, to reach one's ears
to be well known, to be famous
to accept (someone's words), to agree, to understand
hearing what others say, gathering information, opinions, etc., public hearing
newsprint, newspaper used for wrapping, packing, etc.
information, experience, observation, seeing and hearing
unheard-of, unprecedented, unparalleled in history (unparallelled), record-breaking
to catch (someone's words), to make out, to follow, to understand
to ask about (a situation, circumstances, etc.), to inquire
to tell, to (try to) persuade, to advise, to warn, to admonish, to reason

x: 百聞は一見にしかず・ひゃくぶんはいっけんにしかず

sense.gloss: to listen repeatedly, to listen again
to ask a question in return
to ask again, to ask for a repeated explanation
getting information (esp. by interviewing witnesses, etc. in a police investigation)
knowing about many things, having wide knowledge
row house built on top of a castle wall
row houses surrounding a main residence
Vaisravana (one of the Four Heavenly Kings)
memory of having heard something before
strange tale, curious report, strange report
unruly (e.g. of a child), unyielding, disobedient, strong-willed

sdata.j: なんで↑聞↑↓き↓くの？
sdata.e: Why do you ask?

sdata.j: なぜ↑聞↑↓き↓くの？
sdata.e: Why do you ask?

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓きょう↓はもう↑聞↑↓き↓かないよ。
sdata.e: I won't ask you anything else today.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑次↑↓つぎ↓に↑分↑↓わ↓かることは↑君↑↓きみ↓が↑新聞↑↓しんぶん↓に↑載↑↓の↓るってことだ。
sdata.e: Next thing you know, you'll be in the papers.

sdata.j: 「どうかしたの？」と↑小↑↓ちい↓さな↑白↑↓しろ↓いウサギが↑聞↑↓き↓きました。
sdata.e: What's the matter? asked the little white rabbit.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑言↑↓い↓う↑事↑↓こと↓を↑聞↑↓き↓くべきだったのに。
sdata.e: You should have listened to me.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓がそれを↑聞↑↓き↓いたら↑喜↑↓よろこ↓ぶよ。
sdata.e: He would be glad to hear that.

sdata.j: ↑考↑↓かんが↓えていることを↑聞↑↓き↓くな。やることを↑聞↑↓き↓け。
sdata.e: Don't ask what they think. Ask what they do.

sdata.j: これにつきまして、お↑考↑↓かんが↓えをお↑聞↑↓き↓かせ↑願↑↓ねが↓えればと↑存↑↓ぞん↓じます。
sdata.e: I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this matter.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑愚痴↑↓ぐち↓はもう↑聞↑↓き↓きたくないよ。
sdata.e: I don't want to hear any more of your complaining.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓がそのニュースを↑新聞↑↓しんぶん↓で↑読↑↓よ↓んで↑知↑↓し↓りました。
sdata.e: He learned the news while reading the newspaper.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑趣味↑↓しゅみ↓は↑音楽↑↓おんがく↓を↑聞↑↓き↓くことです。
sdata.e: My hobby is to listen to music.

sdata.j: ↑頼↑↓たの↓みを↑聞↑↓き↓いてくれませんか。
sdata.e: Could you do me a favour please?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑分別↑↓ふんべつ↓があるのだから、↑女性↑↓じょせい↓に↑年齢↑↓ねんれい↓を↑聞↑↓き↓いてはならない。
sdata.e: You should know better than to ask a lady her age.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑全然↑↓ぜんぜん↓ぼくの↑話↑↓はなし↓を↑聞↑↓き↓いてくれない。↑壁↑↓かべ↓に↑向↑↓むか↓って↑話↑↓はな↓すようなものだ。
sdata.e: You never listen. I might as well talk to the wall.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑前↑↓まえ↓にこの↑話↑↓はなし↓を↑聞↑↓き↓いたことがあるだろう。
sdata.e: You will have heard this story before.

sdata.j: ↑昨日↑↓きのう↓の↑火事↑↓かじ↓のこと↑聞↑↓き↓きました？
sdata.e: Did you hear about the fire yesterday?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑昨日↑↓きのう↓の↑火事↑↓かじ↓のことを↑聞↑↓き↓きましたか。
sdata.e: Did you hear about the fire yesterday?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑英語↑↓えいご↓が↑話↑↓はな↓せますかと↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓に↑聞↑↓き↓きました。
sdata.e: He asked me if I could speak English.

sdata.j: あなたが↑私↑↓わたし↓たちの↑会社↑↓かいしゃ↓で↑働↑↓はたら↓こうと↑思↑↓おも↓った↑理由↑↓りゆう↓を↑聞↑↓き↓かせて↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: What has made you decide to work for our company?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はそのようなことを↑聞↑↓き↓いたことがあるか。
sdata.e: Did you ever hear the like of it?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はお↑父↑↓とう↓さんの↑忠告↑↓ちゅうこく↓を↑聞↑↓き↓けばよかったのだ。
sdata.e: You ought to have taken your father's advice.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はお↑父↑↓とう↓さんの↑忠告↑↓ちゅうこく↓を↑聞↑↓き↓くべきである。
sdata.e: You ought to take your father's advice.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はお↑父↑↓とう↓さんの↑助言↑↓じょげん↓を↑聞↑↓き↓いてそれに↑従↑↓したが↓うべきだ。
sdata.e: You should ask your father for his advice and follow it.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑話↑↓はなし↓は↑前↑↓まえ↓に↑聞↑↓き↓いた↑話↑↓はなし↓と↑矛盾↑↓むじゅん↓している。
sdata.e: Your story doesn't corroborate what I've heard before.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑話↑↓はなし↓がほとんど↑聞↑↓き↓き↑取↑↓と↓れない。
sdata.e: I can hardly hear you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑名前↑↓なまえ↓が↑呼↑↓よ↓ばれるのが↑聞↑↓き↓こえませんでしたか。
sdata.e: Didn't you hear your name called?

sdata.j: あなたは↑名前↑↓なまえ↓を↑呼↑↓よ↓ばれたのが↑聞↑↓き↓こえなかったのですか。
sdata.e: Didn't you hear your name called?

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑声↑↓こえ↓は↑聞↑↓き↓こえるが、↑姿↑↓すがた↓は↑見↑↓み↓えないよ。
sdata.e: I can hear you, but I can't see you.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑成功↑↓せいこう↓を↑聞↑↓き↓いてうれしかった。
sdata.e: I was glad to hear of your success.
